channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 墨尔本半场失利后，高夫受伤，但为青少年的成就感到自豪
item.description: Coco Gauff will take plenty of positives out of her last Grand Slam campaign as a teenager once the pain of her loss to Aryna Sabalenka in a thrilling Australian Open semi-final fades.翻译:一旦在惊心动魄的澳大利亚网球公开赛半决赛中输给阿琳娜·萨巴伦卡的痛苦消退，可可·高夫将从她十几岁的最后一次大满贯赛事中获得很多积极的东西。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: ASML首席执行官表示欧洲将无法实现2030年芯片市场目标
item.description: Europe will miss its goal of raising its share of the global computer chip market to 20% by 2030 because it is not building manufacturing capacity fast enough, semiconductor equipment maker ASML CEO Peter Wennink said.翻译:半导体设备制造商 ASML 首席执行官 Peter Wennink 表示，欧洲将无法实现到 2030 年将全球计算机芯片市场份额提高到 20% 的目标，因为其制造能力建设速度不够快。
item.author: Toby Sterling

item.title: 亚洲 大米 印度春季价格因供应减少、需求坚挺而创历史新高
item.description: Rates of parboiled rice exported from top hub India advanced to record highs this week on limited supplies and steady demand from Asian and African buyers, while prices eased in Vietnam and Thailand.翻译:由于供应有限和亚洲和非洲买家的稳定需求，本周从主要枢纽印度出口的蒸谷米价格创下历史新高，而越南和泰国的价格则有所回落。
item.author: Ashitha Shivaprasad

item.title: 早盘竞价：特斯拉陷入困境，等待欧洲央行和 GDP
item.description: A look at the day ahead in US and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾和越南将签署海岸警卫队协议，此举可能会激怒中国
item.description: The Philippines and Vietnam will agree to boost coastguard cooperation during a visit to Hanoi next week by Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr, officials said, a move that risks angering China.翻译:官员们表示，菲律宾和越南将同意在菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯下周访问河内期间加强海岸警卫队合作，此举可能会激怒中国。
item.author: Karen Lema, Francesco Guarascio

item.title: 高瓴资本竞购 Everstone 价值 10 亿美元的亚洲健康服务公司 Everlife - 消息人士
item.description: Global investment firm Hillhouse is emerging as one of the final few bidders for Everlife Holdings in a deal that could value the Asian healthcare services company at up to $1 billion, two people with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:两位知情人士表示，全球投资公司高瓴资本 (Hillhouse) 正在成为 Everlife Holdings 的最后几家竞购者之一，这笔交易可能使这家亚洲医疗服务公司的估值高达 10 亿美元。
item.author: Yantoultra Ngui

item.title: 中国谴责美国在台海的“挑衅”并承诺进一步演习
item.description: China criticised the United States on Thursday for causing "trouble and provocation" after the U.S. Navy sailed its first warship through the sensitive Taiwan Strait since presidential and parliamentary elections on the island.翻译:周四，美国海军自台湾总统和议会选举以来第一艘军舰驶过敏感的台湾海峡后，中国批评美国制造“麻烦和挑衅”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国称波音已获准恢复 737 MAX 8 交付
item.description: China said on Thursday it gave Boeing permission last month to resume deliveries of its 737 MAX 8 to local customers, ending an import freeze on the U.S. planemaker's most profitable jets which came shortly after its first delivery in 2019.翻译:中国周四表示，上个月已允许波音公司恢复向当地客户交付 737 MAX 8，结束了这家美国飞机制造商最赚钱的喷气式飞机在 2019 年首次交付后不久的进口冻结。
item.author: Eduardo Baptista, Sophie Yu

item.title: 印度金达尔不锈钢公司因红海危机、欧盟和美国需求疲软下调出口预期
item.description: India's Jindal Stainless Ltd has cut its exports forecast for the fiscal year ending March due to freight disruptions in the Red Sea and faltering demand in Europe and the United States, a top executive said.翻译:印度金达尔不锈钢有限公司一位高管表示，由于红海货运中断以及欧洲和美国需求疲软，印度金达尔不锈钢有限公司下调了截至 3 月份财年的出口预期。
item.author: Neha Arora, Mayank Bhardwaj

item.title: 分析师表示，新规定提振了中国房地产股，但可能达不到目标
item.description: Chinese property shares rose on Thursday, strengthened by the latest relaxation in credit measures to support the embattled real estate industry, but few market participants expected them to overcome banks' reluctance to lend.翻译:中国房地产股周四上涨，因最新放宽信贷措施以支持陷入困境的房地产业而走强，但很少有市场参与者预计它们将克服银行不愿放贷的问题。
item.author: Clare Jim

item.title: 中国国防部发言人称印度边界问题是“历史遗留问题”
item.description: A Chinese defence ministry spokesperson said on Thursday that India-China border tensions were "an issue left over from history and not the whole of China-India relations".翻译:中国国防部发言人周四表示，印中边境紧张局势是“历史遗留问题，不是中印关系的全部”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着美国提前降息的希望减弱，亚洲外汇空头势头增强
item.description: Bearish bets on multiple emerging Asian currencies gained momentum as traders adjusted their bets on early rate cuts by the U.S. Federal Reserve, driving investors to the safe-haven dollar, according to a Reuters poll.翻译:路透调查显示，随着交易员调整对美联储提前降息的押注，对多种亚洲新兴货币的看跌押注增加，推动投资者转向避险美元。
item.author: Archishma Iyer

item.title: Shein 投资者以 30% 的折扣出售股票 - 彭博新闻
item.description: Shein's investors are trying to sell shares in the private market at prices that value the Chinese online retailer as low as $45 billion, or a discount of around 30% to its valuation about a month back, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.翻译:据彭博社周四报道，Shein 的投资者正试图在私人市场上以低至 450 亿美元的价格出售股票，这家中国在线零售商的估值比一个月前的估值低约 30%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 地缘政治、选举和政策不确定性给中国市场带来压力——金融领袖
item.description: Asia's top financial executives expect geopolitical tensions, the coming U.S election and Beijing's policy uncertainty to keep shaking investor confidence in China in 2024, as investors target other regional markets such as India for better returns.翻译:亚洲顶级金融高管预计，地缘政治紧张局势、即将到来的美国大选以及北京方面的政策不确定性将在 2024 年继续动摇投资者对中国的信心，因为投资者将目标瞄准印度等其他区域市场以获得更好的回报。
item.author: Selena Li, Yu Xie

item.title: 台湾开始延长一年征兵期以应对中国威胁
item.description: The first batch of new recruits began serving their one-year compulsory military service in Taiwan on Thursday after the conscription period was extended from four months due to government concerns about China's rising military threat.翻译:由于政府担心中国日益增长的军事威胁，征兵期从四个月延长，第一批新兵周四开始在台湾服一年义务兵役。
item.author: Fabian Hamacher, Ann Wang

item.title: 印度海军参谋长：印度尚未通知其国防人员从马尔代夫撤军
item.description: India's government has not told its defence personnel to pull out from Maldives following a request from Male, Indian Navy Chief Admiral R. Hari Kumar told broadcaster CNN-News 18 on Thursday.翻译:印度海军上将 R. Hari Kumar 周四对 CNN-News 18 广播公司表示，应马累的要求，印度政府尚未要求其国防人员从马尔代夫撤军。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：中国市场在银行准备金削减后松一口气
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook翻译:汤姆·威斯布鲁克 (Tom Westbrook) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 香港最高法院推翻人权律师无罪释放
item.description: Hong Kong's top court on Thursday overturned the acquittal of activist and human rights lawyer Chow Hang Tung of inciting others to join an unauthorised vigil to remember victims of China's 1989 Tiananmen Square crackdown.翻译:香港最高法院周四推翻了对活动人士兼人权律师周恒东的无罪判决，该罪名是煽动他人参加未经授权的守夜活动，悼念中国 1989 年天安门广场镇压的受害者。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Edward Cho

item.title: 美国原油库存减少和红海袭击导致油价上涨 1 美元
item.description: Oil prices rose on Thursday after data showed U.S. crude stockpiles fell more than expected last week and a fresh attack by Houthi forces on ships off Yemen's coast underscored the peril facing trade in a key global transit route.翻译:周四油价上涨，此前数据显示上周美国原油库存下降幅度超过预期，而且胡塞武装对也门沿海船只的新袭击凸显了全球主要过境航线贸易面临的危险。
item.author: Noah Browning

item.title: 航空公司、监管机构对波音 737 MAX 9 喷气式飞机采取了哪些措施
item.description: The U.S. aviation regulator has agreed to allow Boeing's top-selling 737 MAX 9 airplanes to resume flying after inspections, but barred the troubled planemaker from expanding production.翻译:美国航空监管机构已同意允许波音最畅销的 737 MAX 9 飞机在检查后恢复飞行，但禁止这家陷入困境的飞机制造商扩大生产。
item.author: Reuters
